title: WE ARE LOCKED - Team PVC will be building... a 2D Platformer, Arcade-themed mini-game!
body: 2D Platformer took it pretty heftily, but Arcade + Project were neck and neck for a while before it took off. GL HF everybody, be sure to follow the instagram for behind-the-scenes stuff @ https://www.instagram.com/riot_thunderdome_pvc/

replies.body: another boring gamemode,why dont you just make ability draft?
